meanings.meaning_en_US: A thing that is or may be chosen.

examples.sentence: You can select an [option] from the menu.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以從菜單中選擇一個選項。

examples.sentence: He has several [options] to choose from.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他有幾個選擇。

examples.sentence: The best [option] is often not the easiest.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 最佳選項通常不是最簡單的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person or company that prepares and issues books, newspapers, or other works for public distribution.

examples.sentence: Every [publisher] has its own style and focus.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個出版商都有自己的風格和焦點。

examples.sentence: The well-known [publisher] released several bestsellers last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家知名出版商去年推出了幾本暢銷書。

examples.sentence: She works as a [publisher] for a large media company.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在一家大型媒體公司擔任出版商。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The action of one object coming forcibly into contact with another.

examples.sentence: The collision had a serious [impact] on the vehicle.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 碰撞對車輛造成了嚴重的影響。

examples.sentence: The [impact] of climate change is increasingly noticeable.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 氣候變化的影響越來越明顯。

examples.sentence: Her speech had a positive [impact] on the audience.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的演講對觀眾產生了積極的影響。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To move from one place to another.

examples.sentence: I need to [transfer] files to my new computer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要將文件轉移到我的新電腦上。

examples.sentence: They will [transfer] the call to the manager.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們會將通話轉移到經理。

examples.sentence: You can [transfer] your tickets to a friend if you cannot attend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果你無法參加，可以將票轉移給朋友。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To make certain that something will occur or be the case.

examples.sentence: Please [ensure] that the doors are locked.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請確保門是鎖上的。

examples.sentence: We need to [ensure] compliance with the rules.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要確保遵守規則。

examples.sentence: They must [ensure] the safety of all participants.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們必須確保所有參與者的安全。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The largest amount or value possible or allowed.

examples.sentence: The [maximum] capacity of this room is fifty people.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個房間的最大容量是五十人

examples.sentence: Please do not exceed the [maximum] speed limit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請勿超過最大速度限制

examples.sentence: They reached the [maximum] score on the test.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在測試中達到了最高分

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person or company that makes goods for sale.

examples.sentence: The [manufacturer] provides a warranty for its products.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 製造商為其產品提供保修。

examples.sentence: She works as a [manufacturer] of electronic devices.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是電子設備的製造商。

examples.sentence: Many [manufacturers] are adopting sustainable practices.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多製造商正在採用可持續做法。

meanings.meaning_en_US: What is put in, taken in, or operated on by any process or system.

examples.sentence: Please provide your [input] on the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請提供你對該專案的意見。

examples.sentence: The [input] data will be analyzed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 將對輸入的數據進行分析。

examples.sentence: User [input] can help improve the software.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 用戶的輸入可以幫助改善軟件。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A container for storing things, typically with a lid.

examples.sentence: He placed the trash in the [bin].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他把垃圾放進箱子裡。

examples.sentence: The toys were stored in a large [bin].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 玩具被放在一個大箱子裡。

examples.sentence: She organized her papers in the filing [bin].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她把文件整理在歸檔箱裡。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A firm decision to do or not do something.

examples.sentence: She made a [resolution] to exercise more often.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她下定決心要更常運動。

examples.sentence: His [resolution] was to save money for a new car.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的決心是儲錢買輛新車。

examples.sentence: The New Year brings new [resolutions].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 新年帶來新的決心。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The quality of being determined and resolute.

examples.sentence: Her [resolution] in tackling the project impressed everyone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在處理專案時的果斷讓每個人印象深刻。

examples.sentence: He faced challenges with great [resolution].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他以極大的果斷面對挑戰。

examples.sentence: The team's [resolution] led them to success.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 團隊的堅決使他們獲得成功。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The process of preparing and issuing printed material for public distribution.

examples.sentence: The latest [publication] features important research findings.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 最新的出版物包含了重要的研究結果。

examples.sentence: She works in the field of academic [publication].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在學術出版領域工作。

examples.sentence: The [publication] will be available next month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該出版物將於下月上市。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The art or practice of taking and processing photographs.

examples.sentence: She has a passion for [photography] and travels to capture the perfect shot.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她熱愛攝影，並四處旅行以捕捉完美的畫面

examples.sentence: Digital [photography] has become increasingly popular.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 數位攝影變得越來越受歡迎

examples.sentence: He works as a professional [photographer].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是一名專業攝影師

meanings.meaning_en_US: A group of people gathered for a specific purpose, such as to discuss or evaluate.

examples.sentence: The [panel] discussed the issues thoroughly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 小組徹底討論了這些問題。

examples.sentence: She was a member of the review [panel].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是審查小組的一員。

examples.sentence: The [panel] will provide feedback after the presentation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 小組在演講後將提供反饋。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In a different way or manner.

examples.sentence: You should leave now; [otherwise], you'll be late.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你現在應該離開；否則，你會遲到

examples.sentence: She must study; [otherwise], she won't pass the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她必須學習；否則，她不會通過考試

examples.sentence: Do it correctly this time; [otherwise], you'll regret it.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這次正確地做；否則，你會後悔

meanings.meaning_en_US: A natural substance found in many foods that is essential for the body's growth and repair.

examples.sentence: Eggs are a great source of [protein].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 雞蛋是蛋白質的極佳來源

examples.sentence: Athletes need higher levels of [protein] in their diets.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 運動員的飲食需要更高水平的蛋白質

examples.sentence: She supplements her diet with [protein] shakes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她用蛋白質飲品來補充飲食

meanings.meaning_en_US: The action of transporting someone or something or the process of being transported.

examples.sentence: Public [transportation] is essential for city living.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 公共運輸對於城市生活至關重要。

examples.sentence: We rely on [transportation] to get goods delivered on time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們依賴運輸準時送達貨物。

examples.sentence: The [transportation] system in this region is very developed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個地區的運輸系統非常發達。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Items that are manufactured or produced for sale.

examples.sentence: The store has a wide variety of [goods].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家商店有各種各樣的商品。

examples.sentence: He bought several [goods] for his new home.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他為他的新家買了幾樣商品。

examples.sentence: The shipment of [goods] arrived on time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 商品的貨物準時到達。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A device that stores energy and supplies it as electrical power.

examples.sentence: She replaced the dead [battery] in her camera.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她更換了相機裡的死電池。

examples.sentence: The remote control needs new [batteries].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 遙控器需要新的電池。

examples.sentence: Always make sure your [battery] is charged.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 記得檢查你的電池是否充滿電。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A piece of equipment or a mechanism designed to serve a special purpose.

examples.sentence: This new [device] can help you track your fitness.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個新設備可以幫助你追蹤你的健身狀況。

examples.sentence: The [device] was invented to make communication easier.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個裝置是為了使通信變得更簡單而發明的。

examples.sentence: He bought a high-tech [device] for home automation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他買了一個高科技的設備用於家居自動化。
